text: Allah kafiron ke maamle mein Nooh aur Lut ki biwiyon ko bataur-e-misal pesh karta hai, woh hamare do saleh bando ki zaujiyat (marriage/wedlock) mein thi, magar unhon ne apne in shoharon se khayanat (treachery) ki aur woh Allah ke muqable mein unke kuch bhi na kaam aa sakey. Dono se kehdiya gaya ke jao aag mein janey walon ke saath tum bhi chali jao
